summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West McGraw Street to West Ray Street on the west; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15321 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
